Description: DAOs (Decentralized Autonomous Organizations) protocols using blockchain technology are increasingly used to enable large scale, trusted mechanisms for voting.
Horizonstate.com is a “secure ballot system” based on blockchain distributed-ledger technology.

Use case: Use decentralized autonomous organizations to govern operations
Description: Protocol DAOs (decentralized projects issue governance tokens, enabling communities to weigh in on key issues and make their preferences felt through voting.); MakerDAO is an example; Sushi, Uniswap, and Compound can also be considered Protocol DAOs, though each operates according to its own structure.

https://votium.app/ Protocol supporting DeFi governance through decision making (and control seeking), through an auction platform where CVX holders can delegate their voting power and receive compensation from buyers interested in amassing voting power on blockchain

3 particularly when competing interests and behaviours of different stakeholder groups need to be accounted for. Ecological restoration initiatives have often ignored the role of indigenous people and local groups in maintaining ecosystems and failed to account for the local history and political context. In Mazvihwa Communal Area, Zimbabwe, there are ongoing land management problems where woodland grazing areas are increasingly being converted to cropland. After the model was finalised, the Muonde team held workshops with local traditional authorities, including the local Chief, the ward head (machinda), and the individual village heads (sabhuku). In these workshops, they used the model to visualise different actions and resulting impacts, which helped local stakeholders to discuss land management practices, past actions that had resulted in drought and the challenges associated with their agro-pastoral system. These discussions led to policy changes that allowed the reuse of fallow fields for farming. Months after these workshops, the community members reported that the model helped them realise the interaction between their different behaviours, understand the systemic drivers in the ecosystem and to take responsibility for the collective action that was necessary to improve outcomes. (Source: Nesta UK)

Use case: Use prediction markets for public policy planning
Description: Futarchy is a concept of governance where public officials establish possible metrics for social impact, and prediction markets are used to forecast which policies would have the strongest impact on those metrics. The public body would take action based on those prediction-market data points, using them as a sensor. Blockchain and DAO can contribute to making this concept reality.
Crowdsourced, anonymized surfacing of instances of bribes encountered by citizens in India when dealing with their public services providers

Use case: Crowdsource the annotation of a citizen discourse corpus
Description: Granddebat.fr offers to the public the ability to weigh in on many social issues, by providing plain-text answers. To help the analysis, this project enlists the help of thousands of people who tag the contributions.
The Amsterdam data exchange enables interoperability between citizen user interfaces and the various city autorities, as well as with businesses and researchers.
